result.title: Best practices Report: Multi-stakeholder coherence
result.description: The best practices reports will be based on the research, mapping and stakeholder engagement. An online workspace will be used to organise the findings and complement face to face engagement with experts and stakeholders. The reports will contribute to identifying ideas, problems and challenges for EU peacebuilding which will require further conceptualisation, analysis and problem-solving beyond the life of this project. This will contribute to outlining a set of research priorities at multiple levels of analysis and decision-making.

result.title: Compliance to the EU regulation 511/2014 for access and benefit sharing related to the use of genetic resources.
result.description: The EU regulation requests that research on genetic resources taking place after october 2014 has to comply with national laws if any of provider countries that have ratified the Nagoya Protocol This milestone will gather the proofs of due diligence for access to genetic resources by partners of IMAGEAs update additional certificates will be provided on a yearly basis if justified by the ongoing research
